body.name: Reemix Steamer for Clothes, Folding Handheld Design Garment Wrinkles Remover, 20g/min Strong Penetrating Steam, 25-Sec Fast Heat-up, for Home, Office and Travel (Green)
features: UNIQUE FOLDING DESIGN - Reemix is aim to innovate and bring convenience! This handheld garment steamer is different from the traditional ones, we have optimized the internal structure to make it foldable and save more space in your suitcase, so it is the perfect companion for outings and travels, letting you stay elegant and tidy anytime, anywhere.

NO LEAK DESIGN - Although the clothes steamer is foldable, this one is equipped with an electronic pump system so you can iron from any angle, even allowing steaming upside down without any water left behind! The steam can be released by pressing manually, or locked in a continuous steam model.

FAST HEAT - Powerful 1200W steamer, preheats in only 25 seconds or less waiting, this clothes steamer can freshen your clothes instantly. And has a 8- foot power cord, so you'll never have to worry about operating it remotely and you can iron clothes from a distance.

WRINKLE FREE EXPERIENCE - The 7-hole nozzle and wide steam exit, the 20G/MIN steam is discharged strongly and evenly, can penetrate the steam more thoroughly into the fabric, which can effectively remove the toughest wrinkles, can be used for a wide range of fabrics (chiffon/silk/wool/cotton/linen/nylon, etc).

REEMIX SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If you receive defective item or not satisfied with our product, please contact us, we will try our best to help you and give you the best solution. Notice: garment steamer is designed for use with 110 volt outlets and is available in the United States and Canada.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What Make Reemix 2241 Garment care solutions Better? Design: Reemix has improved the interior of traditional handheld irons by making them foldable, saving you more space on your travels. Heat: Newly upgraded rapid warm-up time-just plug it in and be ready in 25 seconds or less. Steam: Exclusive 1200 watt steam flow provides 20g/min hot steam and produces results quickly. Glide: Reemix soleplates are made from the highest quality stainless steel to allow for a maximum glide across all fabrics and reduce efforts.

Questions & Answers: Q: Does it work horizontally, to steam bed sheets? A lot of steamers leak if use horizontally. A: Of course, you can use this Reemix garment steamer horizontally, it has a leak-proof design so you don't have to worry about it. Q: Does it work with 220-240 Volts input? A: No, this handheld steamer uses the US plug and is only allowed to be used at 110V. Q: Can I use tap water directly? A: This is perfectly fine, you don't need to prepare distilled or filtered water. Q:How to refold this garment steamer? A:All you need to do is push down on the head with a little force and don't worry about damaging the machine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this steamer, it’s so cute and it worked great . I used it on the curtains thru out my house and wow they look so nice and wrinkle free. It’s a great price and works awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more irons
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for something convenient for home & travel. I absolutely hate the step by step of an iron. This allows you to steam out your clothing right on the hanger. It’s easy to handle & heats up quickly. Definitely a life changer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The steamer works well
reviews.reviewText: I'm overall happy with this purchase, the only down side is the water needs refilling often especially if you are doing a larger item or more than one piece. It does leak if you angle it too much, but puts out a strong steam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact but packs a punch
reviews.reviewText: I have used commercial grade steamers for a long time. Decades in fact. I very much dislike the whole process of ironing. But they were always so bulky. I tried a few other small steamers but so far this one is my favorite. You don’t need a lot of water and you can drain it easily. The fold up design allows for easy storage and travel. I love taking this on vacation with us. Everything seems to come out of our bags wrinkled and this makes it easy to give them a little steam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This works extremely well for the price. It's our 4th steamer in the last 5 years and this is the most durable for the same price as the others. Just don't leave it plugged in. It gets extremely hot to the touch of you do. Heats up pretty immediately. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewerName: Goid overall experience as described and fast delivery
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This didn't work. No steamReturn was absolutely a breeze.Will try another alternative

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Practical and Easy To Use
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use and is great for traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Finally, a steamer that doesn't leak and spit
reviews.reviewText: I'm so happy to finally have a steamer that doesn't leak, drip and spit all over my clothes, hands and floor!This one holds a lot of water, more than enough to steam one garment unless it's really wrinkled. The hold for filling it is a little small, but if you use the included spouted cup, it's a breeze. It does a good job with wrinkles, but you do have to be patient and hold it fairly close to the garment. Remember, you have to pull the fabric taut at the bottom for the wrinkles to melt away, otherwise, you're just making your shirt warm, wet and slightly less wrinkled. Unfortunately that means your hand is going to be under the steamer while using it for a hanging garment. I've been burned - literally - by spitting, dripping steamers, so it took a bit for this one to earn my trust. And it did. No waiting for that wet spot on my shirt to dry, and no puddle on the floor to clean up afterward. I haven't traveled with it yet, so can't vouch for it's portability, but it does fold up nicely. I also haven't used the brush attachment yet, but it attaches firmly and removes easily. The cord is also a great length so I don't have to steam right next to the outlet.
Me gustó el tamaño, no deja arrugas en la ropa, además siento que la cuida, defintivamente es mejor que el planchado convencional.

reviews.reviewTitle: I'm never using a traditional iron again!
reviews.reviewText: Used one of these for the first time on vacation. They had replaced all the irons and ironing boards with one of these. I can't believe how well it works!!! It heats up fast (and gets very hot) and produces a good amount of steam. For shirts I steam them while they are on the hanger and it works great. For a peskier wrinkly I use the metal plate to apply a small amount of pressure. It is so easy to use I am now leaving the house with fewer wrinkles...well worth the investment.

reviews.reviewTitle: Funciona bien, cumple, hay que agarrarle la onda.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Esta pequeña plancha de vapor está pensada para ser portátil, se pliega. El depósito de agua tiene una capacidad de 100 ml. Es muy poquito, tienes que estarle rellenando con agua constantemente si vas a planchar prendas grandes o más de una. Para prevenir que se tape decidí utilizar agua desmineralizada que encuentras en los supermercados. Todo ha ido bien hasta el momento. El cepillo, como otras reseñas señalan, es una inutilidad si lo empleas al mismo tiempo que la plancha conectada, es decir, mientras avienta vapor. Esto es así porque las cerdas del cepillo quedan en la parte superior de la boca de la plancha, esto ocasiona que el vapor al fluir naturalmente hacia arriba, ya que es aire caliente además de agua, ablanda las cerdas del cepillo debido a la alta temperatura. De este modo, las cerdas del cepillo se deforman mientras tratas de pasarlas a través de la prenda. Entonces, deberías utilizar el cepillo con la plancha apagada, sin echar vapor al mismo tiempo. Aunque esto tiene lógica, pues, se pierde cierta funcionalidad o cuestión práctica ya que uno quisiera poder cepillar la prenda al mismo tiempo que se plancha con vapor, aunque quizá esto sea cierta ignorancia o necedad de uno, no lo sé. Para evitar que las cerdas del cepillo se deformen simplemente no las usen con el vapor. Esto último sería el único detalle negativo inconveniente pero creo que es mínimo, la plancha por el precio y su tamaño es bastante cumplidora y hasta el momento me ha funcionado bien y ya he planchado aproximadamente como 20 prendas, entre sacos, camisas y pantalones. Debo agregar, que en efecto, como señalan otras reseñas, con este planchado al vapor no vas a obtener un resultado como el obtenido con una plancha regular. Recomiendo el uso de esta plancha de vapor simplemente para quitar pequeñas arrugas que se forman con un solo uso en prendas de vestir que aún están limpias y que quieres volverte a poner antes de lavaras o plancharlas de manera regular. O bien, para quitarle ciertas arrugas y pliegues a ropa que llevas en tus viajes. Otra ventaja o beneficio es que si habitas en lugares muy húmedos, y tu ropa está limpia pero simplemente por haber estado algunos días guardada en tu ropero, esta tiene un aroma a humedad o moho, el vapor caliente puede quitárselo sin problema sin necesidad de lavar tu prenda en su totalidad. Así que esta plancha te ayuda a dejar lista ropa que simplemente presentaba un problema de algunas cuantas arrugas, o algún aroma a humedad o guardado, en ropa que está relativamente limpia.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works well - Forgot to read label
reviews.reviewText: I returned the first one without reading the label. I thought the product was used but there is a label/sticker on the product that tells you there will be water residue due to testing and quality assurance. Luckily, I read it again this time and it works great.I did notice it heats up quite hot and takes a bit to cool down but just keep that in mind before shoving it back into your suitcase. I've only tested it at home and it made my super wrinkly linen dress fairly smooth. I haven't tested it in countries without the NA outlet but like blow dryers, I expect you need a converter. But overall, it packs great and I'm excited to bring it traveling.

reviews.reviewerName: No duro más de semana y media, se rompió. Pésima calidad del producto. No duro más de semana y media, se rompió. Pésima calidad del producto.
reviews.reviewText: Es pequeña pero muy eficaz, plancho super rápido mi ropa cuando la cuelgo en ganchos. La puedes incluso llevar contigo de viaje para siempre tener tus prendas planchadas.
